data.name: Magus Pocus
data.detailed_description: In a fantastic world full of challenges, your goal is to recover the balance gem stolen by a 5th dimensional wizard. The mere presence of this mage in our world interferes with its balance, so elementals begin to emerge and the world scene begins to distort. Under the control of an apprentice mage also from the 5th dimension, you will have to face enemies and deadly traps. Come be part of this adventure without you the chaos will never be contained.
data.about_the_game: In a fantastic world full of challenges, your goal is to recover the balance gem stolen by a 5th dimensional wizard. The mere presence of this mage in our world interferes with its balance, so elementals begin to emerge and the world scene begins to distort. Under the control of an apprentice mage also from the 5th dimension, you will have to face enemies and deadly traps. Come be part of this adventure without you the chaos will never be contained.
data.short_description: A 2D platform action adventure game. With medieval fantasy setting. Composed of 9 phases divided into 2 stages and at the end of each stage a boss. With simple and fun movement where you defeat your enemies by jumping on them or using your magic sword. The game will provide you with hours of fun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7.5, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.17+, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
